title: Bakewell tart with cranberry frangipane
description: Give Bakewell tart a festive twist! Delicious with a dollop of thick, boozy cream.For this recipe you will need a 23cm/9in tart tin.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
6 tbsp cranberry compôte (or good-quality cranberry sauce without vinegar)
